front.title: NENA Requirements for Extensions to PIDF-LO

abstract.t: The National Emergency Number Association (NENA)'s mission is to foster the technological advancement, availability, and implementation of a universal emergency telephone number system in North America. In our efforts to support emergency calls coming over the Internet, we have identified several issues with the present definition of the PIDF-LO object. We present our requirements to address these shortcomings.
